name: ChatBot
description: AI chatbot for portfolio site visitors. It learns profile information and details of each application to answer questions about Yuta. Uses Google Gemini API.
architecture: Communicates with Gemini API via Next.js Server Actions. Imports profile.json and each app's detailed JSON files (data/applications/*.json) directly at build time and integrates them into the system prompt. Manages chat history to enable context-aware conversations. Implements error handling and fallback messages. Uses react-markdown and remark-gfm on the client side to render AI responses in Markdown format. Send messages with Ctrl+Enter (or Cmd+Enter).
features: Question answering based on profile information (loads profile.json)
Explanation of each app's tech stack and architecture (loads applications/*.json)
Multi-language support (responds according to user's language)
Chat history retention (managed via messages array)
Honest responses when information is unknown
Auto-focus functionality (focuses input field after sending)
